solution.text:
Volume = Difference in volumes between outer and inner cylinder
\(=\pi \times {r_ o}^2 \times h - \pi \times {r_ i}^2 \times h\)
\(=_{{22*((j+2)**2)*k}}_ - _{{22*(j**2)*k}}_\)
\(=_{{22*k*(((j+2)**2)-(j**2))}}_ cm^3\)

content.text: In the figure below Inner Radius =_{j}_ cm, Outer Radius = _{{j+2}}_ cm, Height = _{{k*7}}_ cm, find its volume
